item.title: Nexstar Media Group buying Tegna in deal worth $6.2 billion
item.description: Nexstar Media Group is buying broadcast rival Tegna for $6.2 billion, which will help strengthen its local news offerings

item.title: Boston Celtics sale is done. Chisholm takes over as owner of most-decorated NBA team
item.description: The sale of the Boston Celtics has been finalized

item.title: Air Canada reaches deal with flight attendant union to end strike
item.description: Air Canada has reached an agreement with the union representing 10,000 flight attendants to end a strike

item.title: World shares are mixed in quiet trading as traders await cues from the Fed
item.description: Shares have opened higher in Europe after a mixed day in Asia
